Item.Name: The Mask
Item.Description:
Traditional mask with large white eye sockets and no pupils.


Although outwardly the eye sockets seem impenetrable, the view from the inside of the mask is unobstructed. Also the mask is surprisingly durable, as you figured it out in a vain attempts to take it off.


This strange mask emits a faint, ominous light.
 Maybe you can somehow use the energy hidden in this item.
